page.title: 10The Elderly in Scunthorpe
page.content: My Nana, aged 63, gets up at 7 am and has a cup of tea. She then washes and dresses, and walks her{dogs}about two miles. When she comes back she has a cup of coffee. Later she goes {shopping,}usually in her own car. When she comes back at 12 noon she makes dinner and washes up afterwards. Some of her afternoon is spent {knitting}or{crochetting.}About 3 pm she has another cup of tea then she does some{rug making.}Towards teatime she takes her dogs for a walk. About 5 pm she makes tea and afterwards she washes up. Most of her evenings are spent reading or watching{TV.}Then she has her last drink of cocoa and goes to bed, usually about 11.30 pm.
